thread.title: Carolina Herrera shows her last collection before stepping down

title: Carolina Herrera shows her last collection before stepping down
text:
Carolina Herrera shows her last collection before stepping down Tuesday, February 13, 2018 - 01:30 
Before taking on a position of Global Brand Ambassador of her namesake company, Herrera kicks off her last collection with her signature black and white palate. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Before taking on a position of Global Brand Ambassador of her namesake company, Herrera kicks off her last collection with her signature black and white palate. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
